body_html: I am not a fan of how this is done -- can we instead put this exception into the build_pip_package rule? Otherwise we have another point at which to control what goes into the pip package -- we already have too many.

body: I am not a fan of how this is done -- can we instead put this exception into the build_pip_package rule? Otherwise we have another point at which to control what goes into the pip package -- we already have too many.
